properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake; Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 7:45AM PST until January 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...Updated wording, adjusted snow amounts.

* WHAT...A period of light snow showers is still expected
coinciding with the Thursday morning commute in Western Nevada.
Snow accumulations mainly a dusting, but some localized amounts
of near an inch are possible especially in foothill areas.

* WHERE...Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area and Western
Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...through 10 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Slippery road conditions are possible in snow showers
especially on untreated secondary and neighborhood roads. Snow
showers could impact the morning commute resulting in delays
and traffic incidents. It doesn't take much snow to cause major
travel problems in Western Nevada. Allow extra time for travel.
properties.instruction:
Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during
periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to
reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since
it takes longer to stop on slick roadways.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING
